main event: Several witnesses reported observing a reddish-orange object just above the horizon on multiple occasions in February 1962, which appeared to change shape and color.
interesting points: The object was initially described as round and then changed shape to that of a football., The object was observed for 12 minutes before it disappeared., Witnesses indicated the object moved and seemed to reflect sunlight after sunset., The sightings were corroborated by radar station operators, but no radar contact was made., Weather conditions were reported as perfect, clear, and cloudless during the observation.
sighted object: a reddish-orange object in the sky
witness description: civilians including commercial fishermen and airmen from the 653rd Radar Squadron
